text: The Club Swan 50 is the only design built by Nautor's Swan designed by Juan Kouyoumdjian to date. It was launched on 4 July 2016 as part of the company's 50th anniversary.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=csjvkbLSjZw It is the most performance-orientated design the brand has produced and has a number of unusual features more commonly associated with experimental race boats and aggressively styled performance cruiser. Example of this include a reverse bow "dreadnought bow" and twin rudder with turbulators on the leading edge and unusually a deck stepped mast.http://www.yachtingworld.com/yachts-and- gear/nautors-swan-announces-an-exhilarating-new-clubswan-50-one-design-by- juan-k-for-its-50th- birthday-68106http://sailingmagazine.net/article-1721-club- swan-50.htmlhttp://www.sailmagazine.com/boats/new-boats-clubswan-50-gemini- freestyle-37-hanse-675new-arrivals-june-2016/http://www.sailingworld.com/club- swan-50http://www.sailingtoday.co.uk/boats/at-a- glance/clubswan-50/http://www.sailingscuttlebutt.com/2015/10/30/clubswan-50-designed- by-juan-kouyoumidjian/ The yacht has had a very good reception by the experts.http://www.yachtingworld.com/boat-test/video-we-test-nautors-swans- radical-and-classy-new-clubswan-50-92697 ==Events== ===World Championships=== ===Swan Nations Cup=== A brand event competing for a "Nations Trophy" the event also commonly incorporates the classes own World Championship. ==External links== * Class Association Website * Nautor Swan * Designer Webiste * World Sailing Microsite ==References== Category:Classes of World Sailing Category:Sailing yachts Category:Keelboats Category:2010s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat types built by Nautor Swan Category:Sailboat type designs by Juan Kouyoumdjian
title: ClubSwan 50
